Exercise

10
 
men
 
and
 
5
 
women
 
are
 
meeting
 
in
 
a
 
conference
 
room.

people
 
are
 
chosen
 
at
 
random
 
from
 
the
 
15
 
to
 
form
 
a
 
committee.

What
 
is

probability
 
that
 
the
 
committee
 
consists
 
of
 
2
 
men
 
and
 
2
 
women?

Among
 
the
 
15
 
is
 
a
 
couple,
 
Bob
 
and
 
Jane.

is

that
 
Bob
and
 
Jane
 
both
 
end
 
up
 
on
 
the
 
committee?

What
 
is
 
the
 
probability
 
that
 
Bob
 
ends
 
up
 
on

committee
 
but
 
Jane
 
does
not?
